question.text: According to the physician, Ms. Oliver’s pain  _____  within two hours of taking the medication.

answer.explanation:
Subject is "pain"=> use passive form of future tense
=> Choose B

question.text: Customers who were surveyed found most of the nine color variations of Malbey purses very -------

answer.explanation: find + object (most of the nine color variations of Malbey purses) + adjective

question.text: Marketers believed that if the packaging were more _____  colored, consumers might pay more attention to the product.

answer.explanation:
Use an adverb of manner to modify verb "colored" in passive form
=> Choose A

question.text: The LPN auto company has issued a special report to address concerns _____  the fuel efficiency of its vehicles.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words.

question.text: The size of private tours of the old castle will be limited_____  ten people.

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of words
=> Choose A

question.text: In about one year, Elger Township will complete the final ------- of a ten-year drainage improvement project.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words.

question.text: This year’s company retreat will focus on techniques that help people think more _____.

answer.explanation: Based on structure: help somebody (to) do (something)

question.text: The police officer directed the traffic  _____  the detour ramp so that drivers could find the route easily.

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of words
=> Choose A

question.text: Please do not use metal utensils when cooking with the pan  _____  its surface doesn’t get scratched.

answer.explanation:
Need to use conjunction to talk about purposes or goals.
=> Choose D

question.text: Employees must _____ requests for time off to Ms. Cheung for approval.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words.
